thread.title: The Trailer For A Remake Of “IT” Dropped Today
thread.title_full: The Trailer For A Remake Of “IT” Dropped Today

author: Francis
title: The Trailer For A Remake Of “IT” Dropped Today
text:
The Trailer For A Remake Of “IT” Dropped Today Francis | Email 
If you never saw “It” as a kid, you probably slept a lot more than me. I saw the original “It” when I was 12, right at the optimal time of my life for it to fuck me up the most. I was scared of rain, sewer grates, laundry hanging on a line, and especially clowns, for years. If you’re not familiar, the movie is about a clown that lives in the sewers and eats children. It’s based on a book written by that that lunatic genius Stephen King (fellow Mainer/psycho). Pretty crazy premise, but it did the trick. 
New clown looks a little too dolled-up for me. Lots of lights and trickery, a little too modern. The simplicity of the 1995 clown was truly terrifying. 
PS- Other movies that scarred my youth: The Ring, Texas Chainsaw Massacre remake, Signs, The Shining.
